Projects About

Chair “Kinbaku-bi”

2019 / Passion Project / Arnhem

“The beauty of tight binding.”

This chair is made up of six milled plywood parts, held together by just an elastic cord.

1:1 model photography: Gijs Ebben

Stijn van Cuijk — Arnhem, 2019 — contact@stijn.vc
